name: Thirsty - The Thirst For Adventure (Demo)
description:
Ah, It's you! Our very first player. Come, come, I'm not going to bite. I heard you like interactive experiences, don't you? But you must have such little time, whilst you lead a very busy life of scrolling aimlessly through itch.io's library of amateur indie games. 

Well, I've got just the thing for you! It's an indie game from a newcomer in the "bizz", and get this - it's so short because it's a demo! Seriously, it can't possibly take more than 10 minutes of your time. Won't you try it out? I might be a bit biased being the storyteller and all, but I assure you that it can't possibly be worse than being run over. And that's all we want in life, don't we? To have a better experience than being run over? 

On a more serious note, this is my first try at an interactive fiction game. Any comments or points that you might have for me will be invaluable for my progress as a writer/developer, and for the future of this game. Thank you so much in advance!
